data.eml:eml: Cochylis Treitschke in China: one new species and five new records (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae, Cochylini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Yinghui, Li, Houhun (2013): Cochylis Treitschke in China: one new species and five new records (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae, Cochylini). ZooKeys 258: 85-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.258.4108, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.258.4108
